edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel

Interface OneTime

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MacSignSecLevel, SecurityLevel
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CbcMac, DSABasedSignature, Hmac, RSABasedSignature, UnlimitedTimes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcHMAC, BcRSAPss, CryptoPPRSAPss, OpenSSLDSA, OpenSSLHMAC, OpenSSLRSAPss, RSAPssAbs, ScCbcMacPrepending, ScDSA

    public interface OneTime
extends MacSignSecLevel
    Any MAC or signature scheme that is secure for one-time use only should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
